Summary: I saw a round light in the Southwest hovering above Utah Mountain. It hovered for about five minutes, then shot straight down and disappeared behind the Mountain.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ivins
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend came to my house about Ten P.M., the night before he saw a V-shaped lights to the North above my house, I asked him if he saw anything tonight, he said, "No." I went out on the driveway and looked all around in the sky. To the North I saw a round light hovering over Utah Mountain. I said, "Is that what you saw last night?" He said, "It's was the same color, but more lights. It hovered in the sky for about five minutes and then suddenly shot down and disappeared behind the mountain.
